img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(8\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/96/Five_Skandhas_%288%29.png)
Follow this to the end to be met with a Buddha's head and the monkey sitting on top of it. Approach, and the monkey will run off but you'll be able to collect the Skandha of Choice from the Buddha's head.
img_below_text:
## Where to use the Four Skandhas
* **Location: Chapter 6 (Mount Huaguo, Foothills, Verdant Path)**

img_summary: The image depicts a cave-like setting with rocky walls and a dirt floor, illuminated by two small fires. It features several large, white, skull-like formations clustered together, suggesting a mysterious or ritualistic environment. This scene is part of a narrative where a monkey interacts with a Buddha's head, leading to the collection of the Skandha of Choice. The context indicates that this location is significant in the storyline, possibly serving as a setting for unlocking a secret boss or advancing in the game.
